title: New Investment Scams Use Facebook Ads, RDGA Domains, and IP Checks to Filter Victims
description: Cybersecurity researchers have lifted the lid on two threat actors that orchestrate investment scams through spoofed celebrity endorsements and conceal their activity through traffic distribution systems (TDSes).
